Name: oprnamespace
column6: the oid of the namespace that contains this operator

Name: oprkind
column6: b = infix ("both"), l = prefix ("left"), r = postfix ("right")

Name: oprcom
column6: commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
column6: negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprlsortop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the left-hand operand (l<l)

Name: oprrsortop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the right-hand operand (r<r)

Name: oprltcmpop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the less-than operator that compares the left and right operand types (l<r)

Name: oprgtcmpop
column6: if this operator supports merge joins, the greater-than operator that compares the left and right operand types (l>r)

Name: oprrest
column6: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprjoin
column6: join selectivity estimation function for this operator
